ygData.msgSnippet: If this is intentional, then I am thoroughly disgusted.  Can you say bait and switch?  We re offered a set of spells, with defined mana costs, but that s not
ygData.messageBody:
If this is intentional, then I am thoroughly
disgusted. Can you say "bait and switch?" We're
offered a set of spells, with defined mana costs, but
that's not what we get. How is this not a bug? Well
I suppose it could just be outright deception by the
merchants of Norath. If this was intentional then why
didn't the patch message make some mention of this up
front?

Hey Verant, this really isn't the way to keep your
customers happy. How would you like it if when you
verify my credit card your payment processor said
"sure he's good for it." and then when you went to
settle got told "oh, he only has half the money,
sorry, and no it's not a bug."

Atrocity
